body: The implementation is for use in the `SnappyFrameEncoder`, which limit its chunk size to this in order to conserve memory.

Being able to configure the maximum allowed chunk size in the constructur would be a nice feature as I would like to use the Snappy encoder/decoder outside of the SnappyFrameEncoder without needing extra libraries

I would if I knew why it is not working and how to fix it. As a temporary workaround I am just writing the data as uncompressed snappy chunks: https://github.com/RaphiMC/ViaBedrock/blob/main/src/main/java/net/raphimc/viabedrock/netty/SnappyCompression.java#L35
Why not just chunk the data as we do in `SnappyFrameEncoder` ?
The protocol I am implementing expects raw snappy data without framing. I would just use the SnappyFrameEncoder if it accepted that
Got it... Then there is not much you can do other than adjusting `Snappy` and provide a PR.

issue.title: Save Snappy's encode tmp table allocation

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
https://github.com/netty/netty/blob/5d452bc8673721b3caa44c727785e7327ac860b5/codec/src/main/java/io/netty/handler/codec/compression/Snappy.java#L164 is allocating a fresh new table in the hot path, see

https://github.com/netty/netty/blob/5d452bc8673721b3caa44c727785e7327ac860b5/codec/src/main/java/io/netty/handler/codec/compression/Snappy.java#L58-L73

It should be saved by using `static final FastThreadLocal` , given that it is used just temporary during encoding from the I/O event loop.

issue.title: Snappy: Use unsigned short to handle 2 ^ 16 input size instead of 2 ^ 15

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
https://github.com/netty/netty/issues/13226

- Avoid iterating to create correct size hash table (limited to MAX_HT_SIZE)
- Configurable snappy frame size for the encoder
- Added static factory method for SnappyEncoder supporting 2 ^ 16 size frame slices
- Added integration test

Motivation:

See the attached issue

Modification:

Unsigned short casting

Result:

Fixes #13226 

If there is no issue then describe the changes introduced by this PR.
